titleStmt.title: A stronge defence of the maryage of pryestes agaynste the Pope Eustachians, and Tatanites of our time, made dialogue wise by Iohn Veron, betwixte Robin Papyste, and the true Christian.
titleStmt.author: Véron, John, d. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete nere to Sainct Dunstons Churche by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
